amendment.description: Amendment includes language in the bill to prohibit the use of funds by a U.S. delegation involving the Commission to Implement the Memorandum of Understanding Relating to the Treaty between the United States and the Union of Soviet Republics with regard to the 1972 limitation on Anti-Ballistic Missile Systems.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 76 printed in the Congressional Record to include language in the bill to prohibit the use of funds by a U.S. delegation involving the Commission to Implement the Memorandum of Understanding Relating to the Treaty between the United States and the Union of Soviet Republics with regard to the 1972 limitation on Anti-Ballistic Missile Systems.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vitter amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
